title: Crunchyroll streaming service now available on the Nintendo Switch
content:
The Nintendo Switch has been around for nearly five years, and even as total sales eclipse the Nintendo Wii, most streaming services still don’t seem to interested in porting their applications to the console. Twitch, YouTube, and Hulu are still the only services with Switch apps (plus Niconico in Japan), but now another is joining

The post Crunchyroll streaming service now available on the Nintendo Switch appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Crunchyroll, a popular streaming service for anime, joins the small number of media applications available for the Nintendo Switch.
